subject: Disasters and Emergencies
Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Because of the Hillsborough disaster in 1989 in which 96 spectators were crushed to death, conditions have improved in many soccer stadiums around the world.
snippet: Because of the Hillsborough disaster in 1989 in which 96 spectators were crushed to death, conditions have improved in many soccer stadiums around the world.
